articles.title: WhatsApp users will lose app features until they accept new privacy policy - 9to5Mac
articles.description: Although this was postponed at first, WhatsApp will now disable some app functionalities until users accept the new privacy terms.
articles.content: WhatsApp recently introduced new privacy policies for its users, which includes new terms ensuring that the app will share data with Facebook as a condition of use. Although this was postponed at fir… [+1737 chars]

articles.title: You Can Get a Clubhouse Invite on Android - Droid Life
